# Emitter Modes

**API Collection**

These constants specify the possible emitter modes. They are used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayer/emitterMode] property.

## Constants

- **points**: Particles are emitted from points on the particle emitter.
- **outline**: Particles are emitted from the outline of the particle emitter.
- **surface**: Particles are emitted from the surface of the particle emitter.
- **volume**: Particles are emitted from the a position within the particle emitter.

## Constants

- **Emitter Shape**: The emission shape is a one, two or three dimensional shape that defines where the emitted particles originate. The shapes are defined by a subset of [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayer/emitterPosition], [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayer/emitterZPosition], [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayer/emitterSize] and [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayer/emitterDepth] properties.
- **Emitter Render Order**: These constants specify the order that emitter cells are composited. They are used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayer/renderMode] property.
